description:
Derrick is an adorable guy from Spain with a sexy accent. He is still perfecting his English so it made conversations a bit difficult at first. However, once he took off his shorts, his huge cock instantly distracted me.

“Do you get a lot of compliments on your dick?”
“Yes people like my dick!” He said as he started whipping it back and forth.
“It's my favorite thing.” He laughed

Derrick has a great attitude and loved showing off his body.

“Have you ever been with another guy or touched their dick?” I had to know.
“No not yet. Someone tried once but I was too drunk.”
title: Derrick
